alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Jackson; Mellette; Oglala Lakota; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 03 at 2:16PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of South Dakota, including the following areas, Bennett, Butte, Central Black Hills, Custer Co Plains, Fall River, Haakon, Harding, Hermosa Foot Hills, Jackson, Mellette, Northern Black Hills, Northern Foot Hills, Northern Meade Co Plains, Oglala Lakota, Pennington Co Plains, Perkins, Rapid City, Southern Black Hills, Southern Foot Hills, Southern Meade Co Plains, Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills, Todd, Tripp and Ziebach. Portions of Wyoming, including the following areas, Northeastern Crook, Northern Campbell, Southern Campbell, Western Crook, Weston and Wyoming Black Hills. * WHEN...Through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Scattered showers and thunderstorms are expected to produce heavy rainfall across the area through the weekend, especially tonight through Friday evening. Two to four inches of rain, with locally higher amounts, are possible in a short period of time. Runoff from this heavy rainfall may lead to flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Jackson; Mellette; Oglala Lakota; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills; Todd; Tripp
